org.onehippo.forge.content.pojo.model

Class ContentNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.onehippo.forge.content.pojo.model.ContentItem
      • org.onehippo.forge.content.pojo.model.ContentNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable

    public class ContentNode
extends ContentItem
    Serializable POJO abstraction for content node (e.g, Node).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
